Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-24786 affecting package moby-cli for versions less than 24.0.9-6
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-24786 affecting package moby-cli for versions less than 24.0.9-6. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-cli is earlier than 24.0.9-6, affected by CVE-2024-24786
